statements: SELECT * FROM sentiment_results WHERE id = 1;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_results ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM sentiment_results WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT id, source FROM sentiment_results WHERE source LIKE '%Twitter%';
SELECT * FROM sentiment_results ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_results WHERE source = 'Twitter' ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM sentiment_results WHERE post_content LIKE '%happy%' AND source = 'Facebook';
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score, MIN(sentiment_score) AS min_score FROM sentiment_results;
SELECT DISTINCT post_id, source FROM sentiment_results ORDER BY source, post_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisResults
SELECT post_id, sentiment_label FROM SentimentAnalysisResults ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE author_username='john_doe'
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysisResults WHERE sentiment_label='positive'
SELECT post_text, author_username, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisResults WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_label FROM SentimentAnalysisResults WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT author_username, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date >= '2021-01-01' AND post_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, post_text, sentiment_label FROM SocialMediaPosts JOIN SentimentAnalysisResults ON SocialMediaPosts.id = SentimentAnalysisResults.post_id;
SELECT author_username, COUNT(*) AS num_posts FROM SocialMediaPosts GROUP BY author_username ORDER BY num_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM SentimentResults WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE date_joined > '2021-01-01'
SELECT id, post_content FROM Posts WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY date_created DESC
SELECT id, sentiment_category FROM SentimentResults WHERE date_posted BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM Posts GROUP BY user_id
SELECT id, user_id, sentiment_score FROM SentimentResults WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT post_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM SentimentResults GROUP BY post_id HAVING average_score > 0.5;
SELECT Posts.id, Posts.post_content, Users.username FROM Posts JOIN Users ON Posts.user_id = Users.id WHERE Posts.date_created > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY Users.username ASC;
SELECT Users.username, COUNT(Posts.id) AS num_posts FROM Users LEFT JOIN Posts ON Users.id = Posts.user_id GROUP BY Users.username HAVING num_posts > 3;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisResults WHERE id = 1;
SELECT tweet_text, tweet_time FROM Tweets WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT hashtag_text FROM Hashtags WHERE tweet_id = 10 ORDER BY hashtag_id DESC;
SELECT sentiment, confidence, analyzed_at FROM SentimentAnalysisResults WHERE sentiment = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisResults ORDER BY confidence DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT tweet_text, tweet_time FROM Tweets WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY tweet_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT Users.username, Hashtags.hashtag_text FROM Users JOIN Hashtags ON Users.user_id = Hashtags.tweet_id WHERE Users.email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tweets, Users.username FROM Tweets JOIN Users ON Tweets.user_id = Users.user_id GROUP BY Users.username HAVING total_tweets > 100 ORDER BY total_tweets DESC;
SELECT sentiment, AVG(confidence) AS average_confidence FROM SentimentAnalysisResults GROUP BY sentiment HAVING AVG(confidence) > 0.8 ORDER BY average_confidence DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisResults
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score, post_text FROM SentimentAnalysisResults ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT user_id, post_date, post_content FROM PostDetails WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT user_id, positive_sentiment_count, negative_sentiment_count FROM UserSentiments WHERE positive_sentiment_count > 10
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM PostInteractions ORDER BY likes DESC, comments ASC
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysisResults WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, post_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM PostDetails WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, positive_sentiment_count, negative_sentiment_count FROM UserSentiments WHERE positive_sentiment_count > negative_sentiment_count ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, likes, comments FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY likes DESC, comments DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM PostInteractions WHERE likes > comments ORDER BY post_id ASC LIMIT 5
